summary: Mastercard is an American company that helps people pay for things using debit, credit, or prepaid cards. It works with banks to process these payments worldwide. The company started as a partnership between banks to compete with BankAmericard (now Visa). Before going public in 2006, Mastercard was owned by the banks that issued its cards. Today, it's one of the biggest payment services, still rivaling Visa.
title: Mastercard
